document.full_text: u.s. military prosecutors have filed new charges against the self-described mastermind of the september 11 attacks in 2001, khalid sheikh mohammed, and four alleged co-conspirators held at the guantanamo detention camp.
document.title: u.s. files new charges against september 11 accused
lines_and_colors: u.s. military prosecutors have filed new charges against the self-described mastermind of the september 11 attacks in 2001, khalid sheikh mohammed, and four alleged co-conspirators held at the guantanamo detention camp.
